description: The PAT_ENC_ES_AUD_ACT table contains scheduling system's auditing of actions taken on appointment contacts.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of audit lines for the patient and contact date.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: PAT_ONLINE_YN
columns.description:
Computed item that returns whether or not the audit source is considered to be from an online, patient or patient proxy initiated source.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
